phasing_details.phase_detail: Safeguarding Works including the supply and installation of new perimeter fencing at 2400mm high

description: Safeguarding Works including the supply and installation of new perimeter fencing, including vehicle and pedestrian access gates along Hayes Lane and central brick pier to match existing. Alterations to internal layout to form visitors and delivery parking (alterations are for safeguarding measures).
subdivision_of_building: Front vehicle entrance to car park and front railings
